game.name: Open Hexagon
game.desc: Open Hexagon is an open-source arcade game developed by Vittorio Romeo, inspired by Terry Cavanagh's Super Hexagon. Players control a triangle, rotating it to avoid incoming walls and survive as long as possible. The game introduces mechanics like a 180Â° swap move and curving walls, enhancing the original concept. Its powerful Lua scripting system enables players to create and share custom levels, fostering a community of user-generated content.
